text: And the people rose up all the day, and all the night, and all the next day, and gathered quails; he that gathered 11. 32 Gr. little.least, gathered ten 11. 32 Gr. cors.measures; and they 11. 32 Gr. refreshed refreshments to themselves. Heb. spread a spreading. וישטחו שטוח.refreshed themselves round about the camp.
